website_summaries.verdict: This model from Easton makes an excellent practice bat, whether on a tee or in a cage. The affordable price point makes carrying a spare more appealing.
pros: Solid sound on contact, not a hollow "ping."
Suitable for both adult and youth leagues
cons: Bat can bend after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: Solid bat with nice pop
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid bat with lots of pop. I play in an adult baseball league and really love this bat. There is no ping like you heard in the old metal bat days. Just a nice solid sound when you hit the ball. The ball seems to jump off this bat. I play with guys that use more expensive bats and I have used them, but those bats seem dead when hitting the ball. I am debating buying another one of these as I enjoy them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Syd

customer_reviews.title: Good Bat
customer_reviews.text: I know an old model, but Son knocks the cover off the ball with this bat. It's a bat. I know ...I know ...this review is not helpful, but I have no scientific method of telling you how good this bat is compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: rubbernuts

customer_reviews.title: Love It! My 12 year old Son inspired me ...
customer_reviews.text: Love It! My 12 year old Son inspired me as I continue to teach and coach him in the game of baseball. Upon our baseball batting cage practices, I enjoy hitting with my S400 bat. While I may order more this bat assist me with my strengthening and batting progress. Great for the cardio!☻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big jimp bit you'll n3ed it for high school.
customer_reviews.text: Great size bat for kods who are moving from little league to high school. The weight jump is hugh so you'll have to decide what length will still be good for you kids. My son is twelve weighs about 105-110 5ft 4" bit strong so THOS is his regular bat length bit the weight jumped from 20oz to 28oz.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Great Bat!
customer_reviews.text: Great bat, nicely balanced! So far so good, no dents after BP and live games. This is being used by 7th and 8th graders, and they seem to like it!!! and it's BBCOR approved which means probably good through HS
customer_reviews.author: theunartistTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Nice bat
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bat. Feels good in his hands and makes the perfect sound when hitting. Very good looking too!
customer_reviews.author: Danell S

customer_reviews.title: Bat-Not to strong at holding up!
customer_reviews.text: My son used this approximately 10 times and it has already dented! I know it wasn’t an expensive bat, but I thought it would last at least a 1 year given Easton’s reputation!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bat, especially for the price. I'm very happy with this purchase, as is my son.
customer_reviews.author: B. Vine

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $
customer_reviews.text: My son has only used the bat a few weeks & it's bent already! Waste of $. >:(
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bat. Hold up well and solid hits with ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bat. Hold up well and solid hits with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Carl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bat for the price! Money well spent for a starter bbcor bat.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Paysinger

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great balance and the ball feels good coming off the bat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the great quality I expected. My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Potter

customer_reviews.title: I'm good at swinging big sticks
customer_reviews.text: My bat is lazy. It wont just hit balls like I thought it would. I have to get mad and swing it around like a mad man before it makes contact. It also isn't very good at listening to me when I tell it to make me look like a professional baseball player. Instead, it silently mocks me and makes me look like a 4 year old, hacking at baseballs like Paul Bunyan. In all fairness, I have only hit 2 baseballs, only because I have only had 2 baseballs thrown at me. #firstworldproblems
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Miller

customer_reviews.title: Bought this bat for my 16 year old son. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bat for my 16 year old son. After getting his timing down right he is now hitting very well using this bat. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: First time baseball player
customer_reviews.text: Great bat. My 14 year old swings it well, and it has a nice pop to it. Exactly what I would expect from Easton.
customer_reviews.author: cueball_23

customer_reviews.title: Great bat so far
customer_reviews.text: Great bat so far. My 13 yr old son loves it. He has been hitting well in Babe Ruth this season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bat bent after 1 ball off the handle
customer_reviews.text: Initial performance of this bat was good. After just 4 games, and 1 ball hit off of the handle the bat was bent. Sending bat back to Easton for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sturkie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good bat, makes great noise when hitting shins. Highly recommend for baseball.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Ehrman

customer_reviews.title: This is a very great bat shipping a little slow but other than that ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very great bat shipping a little slow but other than that it's awesome perfect swing on the bat great feel an just hits the ball so good causing it to go flying love it diffidently buy it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bat
customer_reviews.text: Great feel , good pop if looking for a cheap good bat.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

product_meta.title: Easton S400 3 BBCOR Adult Baseball Bat
product_meta.description: The powerful S400 is fierce, durable, and long lasting. The light weight design helps players generate a smooth, superb swing speed. The high performing Aluminum Alloy will provide players with extreme heat that requires no break in. The balanced weight distribution of the Easton S400 creates a unique feel, and gives players confidence every time they step up to the plate. The 31/32" tapered handle with All-Sports grip, provides added comfort and durability through every swing. The sharp contrast in the colorway also provides the bat with a sleek, timeless look that will appeal to all players. Specifications: 3 Length to Weight Ratio 2 5/8" Barrell Diameter BBCOR Certified for High School and Collegiate Play 2016 Model 31/32" Tapered Handle, Tackified All Sports Grip One Piece, Complete Alloy Construction
